title: Khajuraho
creator_credit: Films Division, Government of India, Jehangir Bhownagary and Mohan Wadhwani
brief_description: The renaissance in Hindu culture of a thousand years ago as seen in the abandoned temples near the village of Khajuraho. Twenty of the original 85 temples remain and in their elaborate sculptures are reflected the religious concepts and the immense artistic vitality of the period.
creator_credit_for_label: Films Division, Government of India, Jehangir Bhownagary and Mohan Wadhwani
